label: Tooltip
description: Tooltip functionality is integrated within various PrimeReact components.

methods.label: Methods
methods.description: Defines methods that can be accessed by the component's reference.

values.name: getElement
values.description: Used to get container element.

values.name: getTarget
values.description: Used to get target element.

values.name: hide
values.description: Used to hide the tooltip.

values.name: loadTargetEvents

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Target element or if undefined will use current target.

values.description: Used to load target events.

values.name: show
values.description: Used to show the tooltip.

values.name: unloadTargetEvents

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Target element or if undefined will use current target.

values.description: Used to unload target events.

values.name: updateTargetEvents

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Target element or if undefined will use current target.

values.description: Used to reload target events. In some cases, the target element can be hidden initially. Later, when this element becomes visible, it will be necessary to bind tooltip events to this element.

props.label: TooltipProps
props.description: Defines valid properties in Tooltip component. In addition to these, all properties of TooltipOptions can be used in this component.

values.name: appendTo
values.description: DOM element instance where the overlay panel should be mounted. Valid values are any DOM Element and 'self'. The self value is used to render a component where it is located.

values.name: at
values.description: Defines which position on the target element to align the positioned tooltip.

values.name: autoHide
values.description: Whether to hide tooltip when hovering over tooltip content.

values.name: autoZIndex
values.description: Whether to automatically manage layering.

values.name: baseZIndex
values.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

values.name: class
values.description: CSS classes to add to root element.

values.name: className
values.description: Style class of the tooltip.

values.name: closeOnEscape
values.description: Specifies if pressing escape key should hide the tooltip.

values.name: content
values.description: Content to be displayed in tooltip.

values.name: disabled
values.description: When present, it specifies that the tooltip should be hidden.

values.name: event
values.description: Event to show the tooltip.

values.name: hideDelay
values.description: Delay to hide the tooltip in milliseconds.

values.name: hideEvent
values.description: Event to hide the tooltip if the event property is empty.

values.name: id
values.description: Unique identifier of the element.

values.name: mouseTrack
values.description: Whether the tooltip will follow the mouse.

values.name: mouseTrackLeft
values.description: Defines left position of the tooltip in relation to the mouse when the mouseTrack is enabled.

values.name: mouseTrackTop
values.description: Defines top position of the tooltip in relation to the mouse when the mouseTrack is enabled.

values.name: my
values.description: Defines which position on the tooltip being positioned to align with the target element.

values.name: position
values.description: Position of the tooltip.

values.name: pt
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

values.name: ptOptions
values.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

values.name: showDelay
values.description: Delay to show the tooltip in milliseconds.

values.name: showEvent
values.description: Event to show the tooltip if the event property is empty.

values.name: showOnDisabled
values.description: Whether to show tooltip for disabled elements.

values.name: style
values.description: Style of the tooltip.

values.name: target
values.description: Target element on global tooltip option.

values.name: unstyled
values.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

values.name: updateDelay
values.description: Delay to update the tooltip in milliseconds.

callbacks.label: Callbacks
callbacks.description: Defines callbacks that determine the behavior of the component based on a given condition or report the actions that the component takes.

values.name: onBeforeHide
values.description: Callback to invoke before the tooltip is hidden.

values.name: onBeforeShow
values.description: Callback to invoke before the tooltip is shown.

values.name: onHide
values.description: Callback to invoke when the tooltip is hidden.

values.name: onShow
values.description: Callback to invoke when the tooltip is shown.

values.name: root
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the root's DOM element.

values.name: arrow
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the arrow's DOM element.

values.name: text
values.description: Uses to pass attributes to the text's DOM element.

types.label: Props types
types.description: Defines types used by properties of the Tooltip component.

ptContext.label: TooltipContext
ptContext.description: Defines current inline context in Tooltip component.

values.name: right
values.description: Right aligned tooltip as a boolean.

values.name: left
values.description: Right aligned tooltip as a boolean.

values.name: top
values.description: Right aligned tooltip as a boolean.

values.name: bottom
values.description: Right aligned tooltip as a boolean.

state.description: Defines current inline state in Tooltip component.

values.name: visible
values.description: Current visible state as a boolean.

values.name: position
values.description: Current position state as a string.

values.name: className
values.description: Current className state as a string.
